summary: In the countryside of France, two groups of boys from the rural villages of Longeverne and Velran are in constant war against each other. Their war is a tradition that passes from father to... See full summary »
cast: Eric Elmosnino|Mathilde Seigner|Fred Testot|Alain Chabat|Vincent Bres|Salomé Lemire|Théo Bertrand|Tristan Vichard|Tom Terrail|Louis Lefèbvre|Victor Le Blond|Arthur Garnier|June Maître|Paloma Lebeaut|Théo Fernandez|Antonio Tavarez|Matéo Faye|Christian Hecq|Aristide Demonico|Emmanuelle Grönvold|Sabine Heraud|Arno Feffer|Bastien Bouillon|Pascal Durozier|Frédéric Sauzay|Alexandra Courquet|Ornella Marduel|Tristan Bernard|Maxime Buisson|Erwan Chauvel|Arthur Chivaleck|Arthur Coly|Maxime Eymery|Loïc Faurieux|Malo Gledhill|Mattéo Godard|Louis-Victor Hamon|Maxime Leture|Ethan Miaut|Pierre Normand|Théo Paziot|Timothée Rouffy|Arthur Brugeaud|Mattéo Buranello|Antoine Dijoux|Léo Faure|Japhet Fély|Enzo Goutoule|Joris Lagarde|Victor Lallement|Tim Linglin|Jules Pouget|Jules Reppert|Hugo Rocard|Enzo Romain|Tom-Hubert Tournois|Théo Touzalin|Pascal Tréguy
title: La guerre des boutons
